scenario_text.value:
So, I just checked to see if I had any
messages.
Turns out I got nothin’. Go figure.

(Minoru says that like he doesn’t care, but
he looks a little disappointed.)

Hey, I could send you a text once we make it
outta here.

Lotta good that’ll do. What I want is
a message from someone in our world now.

But look, I don’t know why we’re getting
texts now, or why they’re less garbled,

but I’m sure everyone’s waiting for you. I’ll
bet you get a bunch of texts all at once.
Hey, I appreciate you cheering me up and all,

but it’s kinda makin’ me feel even more
alone.

What? No way! You’re so good with people.
I bet you’ve got tons of friends.

Seriously, give it a rest. The more you talk
about it, the worse I feel.

I wonder why the texts aren’t so garbled
anymore. Is there some reason behind it?
